alert.note: Alert for Baker; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell and northeastern Baker Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baconton, or near Newton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Baconton, Lester, Flint, Freeman, Red Store Crossroads and Greenough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
